Posts.Content: calisoccermom wrote: Hi there, I'm going in for a biopsy tomorrow but am thinking of switching my breast health team as a whole to UCSF. That would be my first choice, but I'm open to any and all suggestions. Feel free to leave info here or PM me (though I don't know how to retrieve them yet)...thanks so much! (I have a history of fibroadenoma, 1 atypical cell finding in 1999, but no prior BC) Â  Log in to post a reply
